title: Should I be more careful while chatting in game.
body: While playing I use words like wtf and bullshit when I am talking about a event or how I died from time to time. My words are never directed towards a player. Or when I see someone that likes to chat while playing like me I like to make some jokes if they give the feeling they won't have a problem with it. I'm trying to be as clean as possible and started to think maybe I might be violating some of the rules with how I use wtf and etc. or with my jokes. I want to check my chat logs to see if I am really being offensive without realising it and also if a Rioter can please tell me if I have to be more careful or continue like this it would be really appreciated. Thank you for taking your time to read this.

replies.body: I would avoid saying anything. No point and it could hurt the team if someone gets offended.

"!" and "?" are the go-to comments that are always safe and convey anything, everything, and nothing. I agree, it seems that Player Behavior standards wants us to make people feel entitled to something when they feel hurt when it comes to using the ENTER key. Feel free to spam ctrl-2 and ctrl-4 at every missed CS, skillshot, failed gank, etc.

Toxic snowflakes can't keep their own emotions in check long enough to play out a game, even when their spewing of garbage only decreases their likelihood of winning.

I just ping, and say positive stuff. 
I will ask for help when I need it, stuff like that. I rather not toss blame or anything, it ruins games. 
Laughing at my own teammates is another thing I won't do.
based on what you described i think you're fine. as long as you don't verbally "attack" another person, have at it!

You have a weird definition of "not flaming"

If it's mild, like I used to be, your first punishment will be a 10-games chat restriction anyway. So keep watching what you say, but consider that as long as you don't get chat restricted it's fine. You won't get banned out of nowhere.
i advise you move chat box off screen. that way you can't see any flame your team gives and thus don't get "baited" into retaliating and getting punished while they get away.

Nah i wouldnt worry about that. 90% of my chat in the past 5 years is just exclamations like "fuck", "dammit!", etc... and ive never had a punishment.

(Lol it looks like someone came through this thread and just downvoted every reply)
You can always submit a ticket to Riot support and all them if you've been validly reported in your recent games.

There's a difference between saying "well shit, I just died" and " well you're a shit player".

One of them is bannable while the other isn't. Somehow the AI can differentiate with all this.

I had a duo who seemed to type 1000 words per minute, but it was because he was like an ADHD riddled child who had to type every random thing on his mind. He was a very nice guy, it's hard to imagine him ever being tilted/toxic. On rare occasion, he did annoy the hell out of other people. For as much he typed, I'm gonna assume he never got chat restricted.
